home.headline: Nats' young stars shine in exhibition
home.blurb: The Nationals played their first exhibition game Friday afternoon, blanking Georgetown University, 3-0, at Space Coast Stadium.

home.headline: Prospects shine in Yankees' victory over USF
home.blurb: The Yankees opened their spring exhibition slate on Friday at George M. Steinbrenner Field, posting an 11-0 victory over the University of South Florida Bulls.

home.headline: A's pitchers plagued by long ball in opener
home.blurb: The long ball dictated the first game of the Cactus League season Friday, as the Mariners relied on five against the A's for an 8-5 victory at Phoenix Municipal Stadium.

away.headline: Mariners open spring with five homers
away.blurb: The long ball dictated the first game of the Cactus League season Friday, as the Mariners relied on five against the A's for an 8-5 victory at Phoenix Municipal Stadium.
